detectors.title: Computed property access to dangerous function
detectors.description: Detects window['eval'](code) and similar patterns where dangerous functions are accessed via computed properties on global objects.
detectors.remediation: Remove dynamic property access to dangerous functions.

detectors.title: Variable aliasing of dangerous function
detectors.description: Detects const e = eval; e(code) patterns where dangerous functions are assigned to new variable names to evade detection.
detectors.remediation: Remove the aliased dangerous function call.

detectors.title: String concatenation to access dangerous function
detectors.description: Detects window['ev'+'al']() patterns where dangerous function names are split across string concatenation to evade detection.
detectors.remediation: Remove the obfuscated dangerous function access.

detectors.title: Escape sequence obfuscation of dangerous function
detectors.description: Detects window["\x65\x76\x61\x6c"]() patterns where hex or unicode escape sequences hide dangerous function names.
detectors.remediation: Remove the obfuscated dangerous function access.

detectors.title: Comma operator indirect call to dangerous function
detectors.description: Detects (0, eval)(code) patterns where the comma operator is used to indirectly call dangerous functions, changing the this binding.

detectors.title: Destructured and aliased shell execution
detectors.description: Detects const {exec: run} = require('child_process') patterns where dangerous module exports are destructured with aliases.
detectors.remediation: Remove the aliasing or use the original function name for clarity.
